revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Poison Barb |image = [[File:Bag_Poison_Barb_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Poison Barb''. |dex = 40 |effect = Clicks do more damage }} The '''Poison Barb''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the damage of clicks. The Poison Barb is unlocked after catching 40 unique pokemon. ==Details== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || x1.25 Click Damage || 167 clicks || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.3 Click Damage || 167 clicks || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.35 Click Damage || 500 clicks || style="text-align:right" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.4 Click Damage || 834 clicks || style="text-align:right" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.45 Click Damage || 1667 clicks || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x1.5 Click Damage || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}
